title: 107_hr2310
content:
The "Military Pay Raise Act of 2001" increases monthly basic pay for uniformed services members effective January 1, 2002, based on pay grade and years of service. The "Military Pay Raise Act of 2001" increases monthly basic pay for commissioned officers based on pay grade and years of service. The "Military Pay Raise Act of 2001" increases monthly basic pay for commissioned officers based on pay grade and years of service. The pay percentages for different officer ranks are as follows:
- O-4: 9.0%
- O-3: 8.3%
- O-2: 7.3%
- O-1: 7.3%
- O-10 to O-1: 7.3% The pay percentages for commissioned officers based on pay grade and years of service are as follows:
- O-4: 9.0%
- O-3: 8.3%
- O-2: 7.3%
- O-1: 7.3%
- O-10 to O-1: 7.3% The pay percentages for commissioned officers are as follows:
- O-6: 7.3%
- O-5: 7.3%
- O-4: 9.0%
- O-3: 8.3%
- O-2: 7.3%
- O-1: 7.3% Commissioned officers with over 4 years of active duty service as an enlisted member or warrant officer have pay percentages as follows:
- O-3E: 8.3%
- O-2E: 7.3%
- O-1E: 7.3%
These percentages remain consistent for years of service over 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, and 16. Commissioned officers with over 4 years of active duty service have pay percentages as follows:
- O-3E: 8.3%
- O-2E: 7.3%
- O-1E: 7.3%
These percentages remain consistent for years of service over 18, 20, 22, 24, and 26. Warrant officers' pay percentages based on years of service are as follows:
- W-5: 7.5% for 2 years or less, increasing to 8.5% for over 6 years
- W-4: 7.5% for 2 years or less, increasing to 7.5% for over 6 years
- W-3: 8% for over 2 years, increasing to 8% for over 4 years
- W-2: 8.5% for 2 years or less, increasing to 8.5% for over 6 years
- W-1: 8.5% for 2 years or less, increasing to 8.5% for over 6 years. Warrant officers' pay percentages based on years of service range from 7.5% to 8.5% for different ranks and lengths of service. Enlisted members' pay percentages based on years of service range from 7.3% to 10.5% for different ranks and lengths of service. Enlisted members' pay percentages range from 7.3% to 10.5% based on years of service and rank. Enlisted members' pay percentages range from 7.3% to 10.5% based on years of service and rank, with increments at different age milestones. Waiver of adjustment to monthly basic pay rates for uniformed services members in fiscal year 2002 as required by section 1009 of title 37, United States Code.
